body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Welcome to Vincenzo's Benzos. My name is Michael Nelson. How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Michael, I'm interested in learning more about your cars.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to hear! May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's Sara Collins.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sara. To better assist you, could you please tell me which model of car you are interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking at the new convertible models.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Excellent choice! Could I also have your phone number, just in case we get disconnected?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, three four two, one two one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sara. I'll look up our available convertible models for you. Is there anything else you would need today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thanks for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sara! Thank you for your time. If you have any further questions, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day at Vincenzo's Benzos!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Michael Nelson and the customer's name is Sara Collins.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
